            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%A5%E6%9B%B4%E5%A4%A7%E5%8A%9B%E5%BA%A6%E7%9A%84%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%E7%A8%B3%E4%BD%8F%E5%B0%B1%E4%B8%9A%23&amp;from=default">#以更大力度的政策稳住就业#</a>】国家统计局国民经济综合统计司司长毛盛勇：①中央会加大宏观政策的对冲力度，努力稳住企业，特别是用工需求大的中小企业，稳住企业、稳住经济运行，也就稳住了就业。②进一步加大就业优先政策的力度，加大对重点人群如大学生、农民工就业培训的帮扶，进一步推动灵活就业 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyR5DtcZr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483072336961449:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483072336961449&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E6%97%B6%E6%8A%A5%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E8%AF%A6%E8%A7%A3%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E5%81%9A%E6%B3%95%23&amp;from=default">#纽约时报记者详解中国战疫科学做法#</a>】当地时间13日，美国《纽约时报》科学与健康的记者Donald McNeil在电视节目中，介绍了中国在病毒检测、隔离措施、建设方舱医院等方面的科学举措。“在战胜疫情方面，中国已取得巨大胜利。”节目主持人也感叹，美国把病毒检测搞砸了，#美国所做准备与中国天差地别 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyR0LqgCv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483069316260419:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483069316260419&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490178&amp;ssig=8rKby2QcqB" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483064778472648" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyQTrzy7C?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 11:29" date="1584329397000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483064778472648:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 11:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8D%B7%E5%85%8B%E5%AE%A3%E5%B8%83%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#捷克宣布全国隔离#</a>】当地时间15日深夜，捷克政府宣布：从16日0时至24日早6时，除工作或紧急事务，任何居住在捷克共和国境内的人都不得离开自己的住所，全国民众居家隔离。此外，关闭境内酒店民宿，禁止使用共享出租车，建议使用非现金方式付款。截至当地时间15日24时，捷克累计确诊新冠肺炎293例。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyQTrzy7C" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483064778472648:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483064778472648&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_feed_detail clearfix" node-type="feed_content">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%231-2%E6%9C%88%E4%BB%BD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B0%91%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#1-2月份国民经济运行情况#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%89%8D%E4%B8%A4%E6%9C%88%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E4%BA%A7%E9%87%8F%E5%A2%9E%E9%95%BF127.5%25%23&amp;from=default">#前两月口罩产量增长127.5%#</a>】国家统计局国民经济综合统计司司长毛盛勇：1-2月份，医疗防护和生活所需物资增长较快，口罩、发酵酒精产量分别增长127.5%和15.6%，冻肉和方便面分别增长13.5%和11.4%。截至2月25日，大中型制造业企业复工率达到85.6%，生产经营活动正在有序恢 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyQBjy5Cf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483053538124743:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483053538124743&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4483051335774168" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyQxLoe7K?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 10:36" date="1584326192000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483051335774168:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 10:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%231-2%E6%9C%88%E4%BB%BD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B0%91%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#1-2月份国民经济运行情况#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E6%B0%91%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E7%BB%8F%E5%8F%97%E4%BD%8F%E4%BA%86%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%86%B2%E5%87%BB%23&amp;from=default">#国民经济经受住了疫情冲击#</a>】今天上午，国务院新闻办公室举行新闻发布会，国家统计局国民经济综合统计司司长、新闻发言人毛盛勇介绍：1-2月份，面对突如其来的新冠肺炎疫情，在各项政策措施作用下，企业复工复产加快，生产生活秩序逐步恢复，国民经济实现有序运行，基本民 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyQxLoe7K" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483051335774168:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483051335774168&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！国新办发布<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%231-2%E6%9C%88%E4%BB%BD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B0%91%E7%BB%8F%E6%B5%8E%E8%BF%90%E8%A1%8C%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#1-2月份国民经济运行情况#</a>】今天上午，国务院新闻办公室举行新闻发布会，国家统计局国民经济综合统计司司长、新闻发言人毛盛勇介绍2020年1-2月份国民经济运行情况，并答记者提问。 直播，关注！（总台央视记者徐宁宁 李雯婷） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4483044297632830:1034-video:1034%3A4483466860101634:page_100206_home:2656274875:4483044297632830:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6z9CVqc" alt="http://t.cn/A6z9CVqc" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD2%E5%A4%A9%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B3%E4%B8%A4%E4%BD%8D%E6%95%B0%23&amp;from=default">#韩国连续2天新增确诊降至两位数#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E8236%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#韩国累计确诊新冠肺炎8236例#</a>】韩国中央防疫对策本部16日通报，截至当天零时，韩国新冠肺炎累计确诊感染病例升至8236例，较前一日新增74例，连续两天新增病例维持在两位数。韩国政府从16日零时起，将特别入境检疫程序的适用范围扩大至欧洲全境。（总台央视记者李大 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyQcWFMla" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483038429957272:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483038429957272&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%BB%E7%9F%B3%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B7%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%80%E6%89%B9%E4%B8%8B%E8%88%B9%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E7%BB%93%E6%9D%9F%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#钻石公主号最后一批下船人员结束观察#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%BB%E7%9F%B3%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB%E5%8F%B7%E5%85%B1%E8%AE%A1712%E4%BA%BA%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#钻石公主号共计712人确诊#</a>】邮轮“钻石公主”号的船员和乘客中，最后下船的145人已于15日结束健康观察，病毒检测均呈阴性，16日起可依次回家。日本厚生劳动省宣布，在观察期结束前因急病下船的乘客中，有15人确诊新冠肺炎；至此，除去下船回家后发现感染的7人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyQ2SztSX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483032188456363:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483032188456363&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_feed_publish clearfix">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483026991542213" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyPUv6tcp?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 08:59" date="1584320388000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483026991542213:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 08:59</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B9898%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市现有确诊病例9898例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，截至3月15日24时，据31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，现有确诊病例9898例（其中重症病例3032例），累计治愈出院病例67749例，累计死亡病例3213例，累计报告确诊病例80860例，现有疑似病例134例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%99%A4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%A4%96%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD11%E5%A4%A90%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北除武汉外连续11天0新增#</a> 转起加油！】据湖北卫健委通报，3月15日0—24时，湖北全省新增新冠肺炎确诊病例4例，其中：武汉市4例，其他16个市州均为0例。无境外输入性病例。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6z9qmc6" alt="http://t.cn/A6z9qmc6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%235%E5%9C%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B12%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#5地新增境外输入病例12例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，3月15日0—24时，新增报告境外输入确诊病例12例（北京4例，广东4例，上海2例，云南1例，甘肃1例）。截至3月15日24时，累计报告境外输入确诊病例123例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B16%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊病例16例#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#武汉新增4例新冠肺炎#</a>】3月15日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例16例，新增死亡病例14例（湖北14例），新增疑似病例41例。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;当日新增治愈出院病例838例，解除医学观察的密切接触者1316人，重症病例减少194例。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;截至3月15日24时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyPI0k9sq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483019244802918:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483019244802918&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6521735433" usercard="id=6521735433">小气气_999</a>：国家断绝国际航班，断绝并不是不管外国的国人华侨，国家可以组织包机去接，可以收费，他们现在回来也要买机票，而且还是超级贵的机票，而且还有一个好处，包机回来先测体温，把发烧的和不发烧的完全隔离开，不会让发烧和不发烧的坐一起，这样分散回来，隔离的人太多造成交叉感染的几率也大！        </div>

                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#上海新增2例境外输入病例#</a>】3月15日12—24时，上海市新增2例确诊病例，均为通过联防联控机制发现的境外输入型病例。<br>病例1为意大利籍，3月10日自荷兰阿姆斯特丹出发，经法国巴黎转机后于3月11日抵达上海浦东国际机场，入关后即被集中隔离观察。<br>病例2为中国上海籍，在英国工作生活，3月12日自英国伦 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyPzrjr6V" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483013934632449:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483013934632449&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 08:08</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%AA%92%E7%A7%B0%E6%88%96%E6%9C%89100%E4%B8%87%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%B0%86%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#美媒称或有100万美国人将感染新冠病毒#</a>】11日，在美国国会众议院监督委员会的听证会上，接受问询的专家表示，美国疫情的拐点还远没有到来。据《时代周刊》报道，为美国疾控中心提供传播模型的实验室提供的数据显示，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E9%94%99%E8%BF%87%E9%81%8F%E5%88%B6%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%9C%80%E4%BD%B3%E6%97%B6%E6%9C%9F%23&amp;from=default">#美国已错过遏制新冠病毒最佳时期#</a>，预计全国感染人数将在4月底达到峰值，可能有高 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyPtItHJv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483010387079625:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483010387079625&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B33244%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#美国确诊病例升至3244例#</a>】根据约翰·霍普金斯大学公布的数据，截至美东时间15日下午14时20分，美国新冠病毒确诊病例升至3244例，死亡62例。（央视记者王逢治） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E5%8D%83%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#德国单日新增确诊病例超千例#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E4838%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#德国累计确诊新冠肺炎4838例#</a>】德国疾控机构罗伯特·科赫研究所发布的数据显示，截至当地时间15日，德国累计确诊新冠病毒感染已达4838例，较上一日增长了1043例。目前，德国境内已有12人因新冠病毒死亡。（总台记者余鹏） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8D%B7%E5%85%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E5%8D%83%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#荷兰新冠肺炎确诊病例超千例#</a><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%91%9E%E5%85%B8%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E5%8D%83%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#瑞典新冠肺炎确诊病例超千例#</a>】当地时间15日，荷兰公共卫生与环境国家研究院称，荷兰新增176例新冠病毒感染病例，感染总人数攀升到1135人，累计20例死亡病例。另据瑞典电视台，截至15日19点，瑞典新增62例确诊病例，全国累计1023例确诊，死亡3例。（总台记者江华 郝晓 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyPfVAlog" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483001838662036:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483001838662036&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IyPe9Dcnx&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4483000739342379" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyPe9Dcnx?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 07:15" date="1584314129000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4483000739342379:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 07:15</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E8%81%94%E5%82%A8%E7%BD%95%E8%A7%81%E5%A4%A7%E5%B9%85%E9%99%8D%E6%81%AF%23&amp;from=default">#美联储罕见大幅降息#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E8%81%94%E5%82%A8%E9%99%8D%E6%81%AF%E5%90%8E%E7%BE%8E%E8%82%A1%E8%82%A1%E6%8C%87%E6%9C%9F%E8%B4%A7%E6%9A%B4%E8%B7%8C%23&amp;from=default">#美联储降息后美股股指期货暴跌#</a>】当地时间15日，美联储突然大规模降息，将联邦基金利率目标区间大幅下调至0-0.25%。然而，大幅降息后，美股股指期货暴跌，触发5%的跌幅限制。分析人士认为，投资者担心美联储的措施仍无法对冲新冠疫情对美国经济的冲击。美联储已在3月3日紧急降 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyPe9Dcnx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4483000739342379:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4483000739342379&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>   
</div></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482997212674644" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyP8tbdNq?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-16 07:01" date="1584313288000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482997212674644:fromprofile"> 2020-3-16 07:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E5%A2%9E%E5%8A%A010955%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#中国以外确诊单日增加10955例#</a>【世卫组织：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%857%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#中国以外确诊病例超7万#</a>】世界卫生组织15日公布的最新数据显示，截至欧洲中部时间15日10时，中国以外新冠肺炎确诊病例较前一日增加10955例，达到72469例；中国以外死亡病例较前一日增加333例，达到2531例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E8%A6%81%E8%AE%B0%E4%BD%8F%E4%BD%A0%E7%9A%84%E6%A0%B7%E5%AD%90%23&amp;from=default">#我要记住你的样子#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E8%A2%AB%E6%99%92%E6%88%90%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E8%84%B8%23&amp;from=default">#武汉民警被晒成口罩脸#</a>】李寅，是武汉市公安局黄陂分局武湖派出所的民警。连日来，他每天都要下社区排查、在防疫卡口执勤，渐渐晒出了“口罩脸”。网友：这是我见过最帅气的脸！谢谢你！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%AD%A6%E6%96%B9%E5%9C%A8%E7%BA%BF?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国警方在线">@中国警方在线</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4482886139226480:1034-video:1034%3A4482771389710345:page_100206_home:2656274875:4482886139226480:2656274875" title="中国警方在线的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zoUvZ8" alt="http://t.cn/A6zoUvZ8" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中国警方在线的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5669783484" usercard="id=5669783484">橙汁酸又甜</a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans5"></i></a>：向最帅的你<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/d4/2018new_xianhua_org.png" title="[鲜花]" alt="[鲜花]" type="face">致敬<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/42/2018new_baobao_org.png" title="[抱抱]" alt="[抱抱]" type="face">你辛苦了        </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4482876382464619&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2656274875%26mid%3D4482876382464619&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490188&amp;ssig=n1xpNOqP7m" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482876382464619" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyLZAal9V?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 23:01" date="1584284480000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482876382464619:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 23:01</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%B3%B0%E5%9B%BD%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%B7%B2%E8%A2%AB%E7%AB%8B%E6%A1%88%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#北京一泰国输入病例已被立案调查#</a>：去泰国旅游未向社区报备，返京后隐瞒，未自觉居家隔离】今天，北京市报告1例来自泰国的境外输入病例。经查，2月23日，该病例未向社区报备私自去泰国旅游。自泰国返京后未按规定主动向社区报备，隐瞒行踪，未按要求自觉落实好居家隔离措施。目前，北京经济技术开发 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyLZAal9V" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482876382464619:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482876382464619&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E4%B8%80%E6%97%A5%E5%86%85%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2000%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙一日内新增2000例新冠肺炎#</a>】当地时间15日11：30，西班牙卫生部公布数据：西班牙较前日12时新增新冠肺炎确诊病例2000例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E7753%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙累计确诊新冠肺炎7753例#</a>，其中288人死亡。（总台记者魏帆） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=1770939097&amp;screen_name=纸扎铺老板娘" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%B0%E5%B0%BC%E6%80%BB%E7%BB%9F%E6%8E%A5%E5%8F%97%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%23&amp;from=default">#印尼总统接受新冠肺炎检测#</a>】印尼总统佐科表示，他在15日下午接受新冠肺炎检测，这是因之前印尼交通部长布迪被确诊感染病毒。他说，所有其他内阁成员都在今早接受了检测。（总台记者贾建京） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%BF%AB%E4%BD%BF%E8%8B%B1%E5%A5%B3%E7%8E%8B%E8%BF%81%E7%A6%BB%E4%BC%A6%E6%95%A6%23&amp;from=default">#疫情迫使英女王迁离伦敦#</a>】据英媒消息，因英国疫情紧迫，英国女王伊丽莎白二世近日已迁离白金汉宫，在伦敦以外的温莎城堡躲避。皇室发言人表示：伦敦市中心的白金汉宫有500名工作人员，潜在危险大。若英国情况进一步恶化，女王和菲利普亲王将被安排到距伦敦200公里的桑德林汉姆宫躲避。（总台记者侯 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyL6Q9smp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482842442253973:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482842442253973&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490195&amp;ssig=UhrTlIF9dF" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482838856843645" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyL13sIln?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 20:32" date="1584275533000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482838856843645:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 20:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%BB%E6%B1%89%E9%98%B3%E8%80%81%E8%A1%97%E7%9A%84%E4%BB%96%E5%86%8D%E7%94%BB%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#画汉阳老街的他再画武汉英雄#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】还记得那位花了7年时间，画武汉汉阳西大街的退休美术教师易小阳吗？近日，他在自家阳台挂出手绘的《英雄的城市、英雄的人民》，为武汉加油，也为市民们鼓劲。转起！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%87%B4%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E7%9A%84%E5%9F%8E%E5%B8%82%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E7%9A%84%E4%BD%A0%E4%BB%AC%23&amp;from=default">#致英雄的城市英雄的你们#</a>！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4482838856843645:1034-video:1034%3A4482838825992202:page_100206_home:2656274875:4482838856843645:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zoF2yg" alt="http://t.cn/A6zoF2yg" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4482832091417624" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyKQ95WMU?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 20:05" date="1584273920000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482832091417624:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 20:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【怒！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%9A%E5%9C%B0%E6%9F%A5%E8%8E%B7%E4%B8%8D%E5%90%88%E6%A0%BC%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E4%B8%80%E6%92%95%E5%B0%B1%E7%83%82%23&amp;from=default">#多地查获不合格口罩一撕就烂#</a>】近日，市场监管部门查处了一批涉及口罩等防疫物品的违法案件。在查获的口罩中，有的做工粗糙，看着透光，一撕就烂；有的N95口罩未标注生产日期，隔着包装还能看到口罩上的污点，却以每枚20多元的价格销售……各地市场监管部门将继续加大打击力度↓&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyKQ95WMU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482832091417624:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482832091417624&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="media_box">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482825526532781" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyKFyrptr?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 19:39" date="1584272355000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482825526532781:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 19:39</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/48/2018new_huatong_org.png" title="[话筒]" alt="[话筒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">各位同学请注意！疫情期间<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E7%A5%A8%E5%BB%B6%E9%95%BF%E8%87%B35%E6%9C%8831%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#学生票延长至5月31日#</a>】14日，中国铁路12306网站更新《铁路互联网购票须知》：疫情期间，学生票寒假的乘车时间已由12月1日至3月31日延长至5月31日↓转发周知！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E8%B6%8510%E4%B8%87%E4%BA%BA%E7%AD%BE%E5%AD%97%E5%91%BC%E5%90%81%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C%E7%A7%AF%E6%9E%81%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%23&amp;from=default">#英国超10万人签字呼吁政府积极防控#</a>】据英国卫生当局14日数据：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A1140%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#英国累计确诊1140例新冠肺炎#</a>，死亡21例。截至当地时间14日上午，已有超10万人在请愿书上签字，呼吁英国政府采取“更积极的方式”，阻止疫情蔓延。请愿书说，英国有必要效仿意大利，限制一切非必要市镇间人员流动，同时限制大型集会。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyKyR0V0w" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482821370219140:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482821370219140&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%B5%81%E5%8A%A8%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙限制人员流动第一天#</a>情况如何？看直播！】当地时间14日，西班牙首相桑切斯宣布，全西班牙限制人员流动，除购买食品、就医、工作等原因外，所有人须强制留在家中，不得在街上随意走动。西班牙首都马德里现在是什么样子？当地民众如何看待此措施？关注！（总台记者魏帆） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4482817427848116:1034-video:1034%3A4482820895080453:page_100206_home:2656274875:4482817427848116:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zoH9yN" alt="http://t.cn/A6zoH9yN" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyKsuwVEw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482817427848116:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482817427848116&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482816547354349" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyKr4uRcx?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 19:03" date="1584270214000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482816547354349:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 19:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E8%90%A8%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E5%AE%A3%E5%B8%83%E8%BF%9B%E5%85%A5%E7%B4%A7%E6%80%A5%E7%8A%B6%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#哈萨克斯坦宣布进入紧急状态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E8%90%A8%E5%85%8B%E6%96%AF%E5%9D%A6%E9%99%90%E5%88%B6%E4%B8%80%E5%88%87%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F%E5%87%BA%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%23&amp;from=default">#哈萨克斯坦限制一切方式出入境#</a>】据哈媒报道，哈萨克斯坦总统托卡耶夫15日宣布，为防范新冠肺炎疫情蔓延，自3月16日8时至4月15日7时全国进入紧急状态。除外交人员、应哈方邀请的国际组织代表团以外，严禁任何人以任何方式出入境。截至目前，哈萨克斯坦累计确诊8例新冠 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyKr4uRcx" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482816547354349:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482816547354349&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">

        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482811136324154" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyKilqxcu?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 18:42" date="1584268923000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482811136324154:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 18:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E13938%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗累计确诊新冠肺炎13938例#</a>】据伊朗卫生部最新消息，当地时间15日，伊朗新增新冠肺炎确诊病例1209例，新增死亡113例。截至当天中午，伊朗累计确诊新冠肺炎病例13938例，其中4590例康复，724例死亡。(总台记者李健南 倪紫慧) ​​​​                                            </div>

class=\"item_ico W_fl\"><em class=\"W_ficon ficon_pinfo S_ficon\">Ü<\/em><\/span>\r\n    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"item_text W_fl\">\r\n    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t简介：    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t    \t\t\t\t\t\t\t“央视新闻”微博是中央电视台新闻中心官方微博，是央视重大新闻、突发事件、重点报道的首发平台。    \t\t\t\t\t\t <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"
